insert into error (gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, time, phenomenon, reason, solution, product_model, error_type, engineer, product_version, replace_name_code, month_sample_count, day_sample_count) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phenomenon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{engineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replaceNameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daySampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update error set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phenomenon = #{phenomenon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution = #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_type = #{errorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engineer = #{engineer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_version = #{productVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, replace_name_code = #{replaceNameCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_sample_count = #{monthSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day_sample_count = #{daySampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, time, phenomenon, reason, solution, product_model, error_type, engineer, product_version, replace_name_code, month_sample_count, day_sample_count from error where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
